Articles.Content:
I used to be an avid Spore player, and I would spend ages on Space Stage, just messing around, making allies and fighting pirates. Because of my Spore playing every time I make a space battleship in KSP, or hear theres a battle using space battleships in the naval battle club, all that starts playing in my head is the combat music from space stage from Spore. It's awesome.

And since that videos quite short, if you want to listen to it on repeat theres another link. To a different website.

Here this is!

I love this music, it's awesome, especially awesome compared to the pile of crap Spore has become.
I get the elite dangerous music in the background. So epic!
Everytime I'm making a battleship, DUN DUN DUN DUN DUN
Hmmm. This is close to Imperial March...
